title: Facebook Aims To Weed Fakes From Your News Feed
teaser: No, Macauley Culkin didn't die â€” that was a fake news story you saw on Facebook. This week, Facebook added a feature for reporting hoaxes. NPR's Laura Sydell explains the details to Scott Simon.
